The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear Parents,<?xml:namespace prefix = o />
Our friends from GWIC (Guangzhou Women's International Club) will hold a 'Christmas Bazaar' on Tuesday, 19th November 2013. The event will be held at Oakwood Gold Arch on Ersha Island, from 10am till 3pm. NO ENTRANCE FEE.
They will offer a lovely day of shopping with friends old and new Jewellery, clothes, books, table linens, shoes, food, wine and much more will be available for you to peruse!
All are welcome so please invite your friends if you wish.
For details of this charity event, please visit http://gwic.org/.
Best wishes,
The British School of Guangzhou
